def_cn: 强调…的重要性；夸大；渲染
def_en: If you play up something, you emphasize it and try to make people believe that it is important.

def_cn: （机器、身体部位等）（给…）制造麻烦，（使）痛苦
def_en: If something such as a machine or a part of your body is playing up or is playing you up, it is causing problems because it is not working properly.
When children play up, they are naughty and difficult to control.
